Package languageTools.program.agent.validation.agentfile

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionComboValidator
    Validator for ActionCombos.
    Main function is to resolve any UserSpecOrModuleCalls.
    ActionSpecificationValidator
    Validator for ActionSpecifications.
    Checks for the following error: postcondition contains variables that are bound neither by the precondition nor by the action's parameters. author K.Hindriks
    ActionValidator
    Validator for an Action.
    ActionValidator checks for the following errors: In the action's parameters variables occur that are not bound.
    GOALProgramValidator
    Validator for a GOALProgram.
    Checks for the following errors: The absence of both the event module and main module. Imported files that do not exist. Checks for the following warnings: Defined but unused macros (this is done here so that these warnings do not get printed multiple times) Macros that have unused parameters. Macros that hide definitions of other macros Expressions that are defined but not queried Expressions that are queried, but never defined Further errors and warnings may be generated by other Validators, e.g.
    ModuleValidator
    Validator for Modules.
    Checks for the following errors: Goals in the goals section with free variables that are not instantiated by the module's parameters. The presence of a beliefs section in any other module than the init module. The absence of the section in any other module than the init module. Errors in rules (see RuleValidator) Errors in actions (see ActionValidator) Checks for the following warnings: The absence of a reference to the module (unless it is the init, event or main module) Warnings generated by rules (see RuleValidator) Warnings generated by actions (see ActionValidator) Unused action specifications Variable names in action specifications that are the same as variables bound by the module's parameters.
    NameSpaceValidator
    Validator for RuleSets.
    Errors and warnings are generated by the RuleValidator used to validate individual Rules.
    RuleSetValidator
    Validator for RuleSets.
    Errors and warnings are generated by the RuleValidator used to validate individual Rules.
    RuleValidator
    Validator for a Rule.
    Checks for the following errors: The occurrence of actions without specifications in the body of the rule.

    GOALError  
    GOALWarning
